title: Stop Node.js substitute server on localhost:8081
description: Identify and terminate the Node.js server running on port 8081 that's currently serving the substitute Nexus interface

title: Fix Python dependencies in ~/Downloads/nexus
description: Install dotenv and all required Python dependencies from requirements.txt to restore the original Nexus system environment

title: Start original Python-based Nexus system
description: Launch the original Python-based Nexus system using start-nexus.sh script and verify it's running correctly

title: Verify backend integrations (Ollama, Anthropic, skills)
description: Test and ensure all backend integrations are working: Ollama connection, Anthropic API, and skills system functionality

title: Create Kanban tickets for restoration process
description: Set up task tracking through the Kanban system so restoration progress is visible on the task board
